label: 青馬
対訳語: Horses, Parade of. Green horse festival""
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A court ceremony, held annually on the seventh day of the first month. Horses from the imperial stables were paraded in front of the emperor and other spectators, and there was a banquet later in the day. McCullough and McCullough 1980: 382-383.
